name: Zwark
overview: A space invaders type game. When you start the game you will be attacked by one Zwark at a time. Beware the Zwark! He is very unpredictable. If you fail to shoot the Zwark out of the sky before he approaches the bottom of the screen, get out of the way, he is deadly. As your score gets higher, more Zwarks will begin appearing on the screen.
